heroInfo.description: Aspiring Frontend Engineer passionate about building interactive and responsive web applications. Currently in my final year of B.Tech, gaining real-world experience through an internship in UI/UX development.

listOfAchievements.text: Received the Best Research Paper Award for significant contributions to artificial intelligence applications in education, with the research published in a renowned international journal.
Successfully completed the Stanford University Machine Learning Certification, gaining expertise in supervised and unsupervised learning, deep learning, and AI-driven decision-making.
Invited as a keynote speaker at the National Education Summit, where I delivered a session on the impact of AI and big data in modern educational methodologies.
Honored with the Distinguished Professor Award by a prestigious university in recognition of excellence in research, teaching, and academic leadership.
Mentored over 50 Ph.D. and Master’s students, guiding research scholars in various domains including artificial intelligence, cybersecurity, and blockchain applications.

projects.headline1: Enhancing the UI/UX of Zomato's web platform.
projects.headline2: Improved page load speed by 30% using lazy loading & code splitting.
projects.skills: React.js, Next.js, Tailwind CSS, TypeScript, Web Performance Optimization

qualifications.courseName: Bachelor of Technology (B.Tech) in Computer Science

qualifications.headline2: Developing real-world projects as part of coursework.

qualifications.headline1: Built a basic e-commerce website as a school project.
